---
layout: '@layouts/Blog.astro'
title: Disk and Washer Method 
date: 04/28/24
author: Sarai Marte
---

<span style=" font-family: var(--primaryFont);">

**1.** Let R be the region enclosed by the graph y = 2√x, x = 0 to x = 4 and the x-axis. Find the volume of the solid that is formed by revolving this region around the x-axis.  

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<details>

  <summary> Solution </summary>
  
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

    30pi disk

  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</details>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

**2.** Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving y = √x , around the x-axis and bounded by x = 0 and x = 4.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<details>

  <summary> Solution </summary>
  
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

    8pi disk

  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</details>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

**3.** Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving y = x<sup>3</sup> , around the x-axis and bounded by y = 0 and x = 2.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<details>

  <summary> Solution </summary>
  
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

    128pi/7 disk

  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</details>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

**4.**  Find the volume of the solid formed by the region bounded by the graphs: f(x) = x<sup>2</sup> − 4x + 5, x = 1, and x = 4, when rotated about the x-axis.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<details>

  <summary> Solution </summary>
  
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

   78pi/5 disk

  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</details>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;


**5.**  Find the volume of the solid formed by the region bounded by the graphs: x = y<sup>2</sup>, x = 2y, when rotated about the y-axis.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<details>

  <summary> Solution </summary>
  
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

   64pi/15 washer


  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</details>


</span>
